item.title: Obama Calls On International Community To Fight Ebola
item.description: The president warned that the U.S. alone could not halt the epidemic and that without more help to stop the disease, hundreds of thousands of people could die.

item.title: Liberian Expatriates In Atlanta Join Together To Fight Ebola
